issue.title: [CF 2] Conditions for showing icon groups
issue.body:
I just tried TellMeWhen and I'm very fond of it, but as I prefer to show "when absent" and "only show in combat", it's showing my cat requirements (e.g. Rip) when I'm in Bear form and vice versa.

For Druids (and maybe other classes too) it would be great to add conditions when to show the icon groups.

The most simple way I could think of woule be to link the "active" setting to a buff.

e.g. show icon group 1, condition: "Dire Bear Form" is active
and show icon group 2, condition: "Cat Form" is active

I think Warriors would also like it, for stances (which are not buffs), maybe DKs depending on their aura (which are buffs), and so on


> Posted by CurseForge user dieck | Imported from CurseForge issue #2 | Raw

comments.body:
This is all part of stance/form/presence support that I'm hoping to have time for eventually.
